name: AskaFinancialAdvisor
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Daily answers to your personal finance questions from a wide variety of topics from a fiduciary, fee-only financial advisor.. 

Topics covered include: College savings, Retirement, Investing, Stocks, Bonds, Asset Allocation, Taxes, Social Security, The Stock Market, and much, much more. 

To ask Matt a question, email: Matt@HyllandCapital.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
